name: Our Cramped Little World
description:
Our Cramped Little World is a game about challenges of everyday life in a very small flat.

Try to fit in all of the furnitures and then try to figure out how to accomplish a few simple tasks, for example : how are you supposed to make a dinner if the fridge is blocked by a washingmachine and there is a bath on your way to it?

Game created during Ludum Dare 38 by

Estefania Romero-Cors (@zotapianola)

Bartłomiej Sieczka (@ret44)

Piotr Bartosiak (@pitofpit)

UPDATE 27.04.2017
Ludum Dare Version:
- Fixed raycast bug, that could made phase 2 unplayable
- Fixed incorrect twitter handle.

UPDATE 16.04.2017
Added Post-Jam version:
- Item placement doesn't have "weight"
- Some sounds and music fixes
- Added few visual effects.
